title: Lighting Up Aladino From JRE Tobacco
itunes:title: Lighting Up Aladino From JRE Tobacco
description:
The wolf is hungry, he runs the show… he’s licking his lips, he’s ready to win so what is wrong with another sin? We were originally scheduled to have on the show Justo Eiroa from JRE Tobacco but he flew home to be with his family as Irma is prepared to create havoc in the state of Florida.

However the boys will rock you like a hurricane as we light up the first cigar from the September care package with the Aladino that features 100% Corojo tobacco.

Join us live for the madness known as The Cigar Authority with your host David Garofalo, and co-hosts Mr. Jonathan and Barry Stein for the number 1 cigar podcast on the internet!

The Cigar Authority is recorded live in front of a studio audience at Studio 21 Podcast Cafe upstairs at Two Guys Smoke Shop in Salem, NH and as always you can find many of the cigars we discuss at http://www.2GuysCigars.com/.
